title: Blended Teaching Method Design Based on Mobile Learning Acceptance Factors [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational digital literacy and educational experience
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Strategies for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers: Fostering Mobile Learning Readiness

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three design principles for interactive content that enhance self-efficacy in mobile learning environments.
Learners can apply the UTAUT model-based mobile learning acceptance factors (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence, facilitating conditions) to actual lesson design.
Through project-based assessment, learners can develop one mobile microlearning activity to enhance learner satisfaction and establish an implementation plan.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
